nodes.text: The Perception D-package enhanced a being's wisdom and confidence in their mental attributes so as to enable them to persuade others to their way of thinking. The technology of D-Package implants had the consequence of rendering them larger and more intrusive than other types. Thus, they tended to have more impressive effects, but could only be used by very healthy individuals.
In the game, the playable character must have a constitution attribute of 18 or higher.
